text: Raymond James "Ray" Donovan (August 31, 1930 - June 2, 2021) was an American businessman and politician. He served as U.S. Secretary of Labor under President Reagan from 1981 until 1985. Donovan was born in Bayonne, New Jersey. Donovan died on June 2, 2021 in New Vernon, New Jersey from congestive heart failure at the age of 90.Raymond J. title: Raymond J. Donovan
